name: Constructor (itch)
description:
The year is 3027. Earth has become near inhospitable due to a number of factors. Humanity has sent ships across space to land on various planets, with the hope that some of them shall be habitable. You, a robot, have been sent ahead of time to a planet that has potential to host human life. You have a limited amount of time to make the planet hospitable to the party of approaching human life before they arrive.

Game has a known visual bug but nothing game breaking. F1 to fullscreen.
